Package util

Class UTCTime

java.lang.Object
util.UTCTime
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<UTCTime>
public class UTCTime extends Object implements Comparable<UTCTime>
Represents a coordinated moment in time, in UTC.

      public static UTCTime now()

      Returns:

    • of

      public static UTCTime of(String datetime, String timezone) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new UTCTime object from a datetime string and unix TZ identifier.
      Parameters:
      datetime - a datetime string in the format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS or a date-only string in the format yyyy-MM-dd.
      timezone - the unix TZ identifier of a timezone.
      Returns:
      a new UTCTime object from a datetime string and unix TZ identifier.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • to

      public UTCTime to(String timezone) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new UTCTime object representing the same instant in time as this object in the specified timezone.
      Parameters:
      timezone - the unix TZ identifier to convert this UTCTime to.
      Returns:
      a new UTCTime representing the same instant in time with the specified timezone.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

      Returns whether this UTCTime represents the same chronological instant as the argument.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      whether this UTCTime represents the same chronological instant as the argument.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(UTCTime utcTime)
      Compares this UTCTime object to another UTCTime object.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<UTCTime>
      Parameters:
      utcTime - the UTCTime to compare to.
      Returns:
      0 if the times are equal, -1 if this object is before the argument, and 1 if this object is after the argument.
      See Also:
      • isBefore(util.UTCTime)
      • isEqual(util.UTCTime)

    • get

      public int get(ChronoField field)
      Gets the value of a field in this UTCTime.
      Parameters:
      field - the time-related field to get the value of. This should be one of the ChronoFields of UTCTime.
      Returns:
      the value of a field in this UTCTime.

    • plus

      public UTCTime plus(long amount, ChronoUnit unit)
      Returns a new UTCTime object where the specified time-related unit has the specified amount added to the original value.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to add to the specified unit.
      unit - the unit to add the specified amount to.
      Returns:
      a new UTCTime object where the specified time-related unit has the specified amount added to the original value. If unit == null, then null is returned.

    • getEpoch

      public long getEpoch()
      Gets the millisecond offset from the unix epoch of this UTCTime.
      Returns:
      the millisecond offset from the unix epoch of this UTCTime.

    • shiftedToClosest

      public UTCTime shiftedToClosest(DayOfWeek day)
      Returns a new UTCTime object with the day value set to the closest instance of the specified day of the week.
      Parameters:
      day - the day of the week to shift towards.
      Returns:
      a new UTCTime object with the day value set to the closest instance of the specified day of the week.

    • toMidnight

      public UTCTime toMidnight()
      Returns a new UTCTime object with the same date as this object and a time of 00:00:00.000.
      Returns:
      a new UTCTime object with the same date as this object and a time of 00:00:00.000.

    • toMidnight

      public UTCTime toMidnight(String timezone)
      Returns a new UTCTime object representing midnight in the specified timezone.

      The returned UTCTime object is still in UTC time. The operation is order is:

      • Convert this object to the specified timezone.
      • Convert the new object (in the specified local timezone) to midnight in that tz.
      • Convert the local-midnight object back to UTC time. The result may or may not have a final time of 00:00:00.000.
      Parameters:
      timezone - the unix TZ identifier to get a UTC-aligned midnight time for.
      Returns:
      a new UTCTime object representing midnight in the specified timezone.

    • getDayTag

      public String getDayTag()
      Returns the day tag of this UTCTime. The day tag is in the format yyyy-MM-dd.
      Returns:
      the day tag of this UTCTime.

    • getTagForClosest

      public String getTagForClosest(DayOfWeek day)
      Returns the day tag of the result of shiftedToClosest(day).
      Parameters:
      day - the day of the week to get the day tag for.
      Returns:
      the day tag of the result of shiftedToClosest(day).
      See Also:
      • shiftedToClosest(java.time.DayOfWeek)

    • getWeekTag

      public String getWeekTag()
      Returns the day tag of the closest sunday to the current time. This method is identical to getTagForClosest(UTCTime.SUNDAY).
      Returns:
      the day tag of the closest sunday to the current time.

      public String toString()
